## Power Query week plan

## What's Power Query?
It's a set of data-wrangling tools in Excel/Power BI. It's designed to help you load/tidy/reshape data. It's especially exciting, because you can use it to automate some aspects of data handling, potentially saving yourself hours of manual data work. If you're currently doing data cleaning by hand in Excel, you should know about PQ.
